page.title: 15HOLMESFIELD SUMMER EVENTS
page.content: May 4th. Pheonix Sports Club. The jumble sale on 4th May made a profit of Â£81.85. May 14th.Holmesfield Over 60's Club. Visit Melton Mowbray & Belvoir Castle. May 22nd.Penny Acres Primary School. Singing and recorder playing at the Dronfield Schools' Music Festival. May report. Holmesfield Cricket Club. Despite the poor weather causing several cancellations the Saturday League side has made a good start to the season beating Ridgeway and Chesterfield in the league and Sheepbridge in the cup. In our only friendly match we visited Thoresby Park where we were less successful, losing by 28 runs.
